name: Subdue the Creatures
description:
You are asked by a friend for a special job.

It's the job of subduing creatures.

あなたは友人から特殊な仕事を頼まれます。

それはクリーチャー討伐という仕事です。

◆How To Play 操作説明 ActionKey/ButtonInteractF keyHold a weaponRight mouse buttonAttackLeft mouse  button
You can not attack unless you hold the weapon by right-clicking the mouse.
